Pictures From Last Night: No Ceilings 2

posted by Confusion on December 11, 2014 in News
« PreviousShift + ← Next »Shift + → 1 of
Photo by Liz Barclay

Last night, Pigeons & Planes took over The Studio at Webster Hall for the second installation of No Ceilings. It was Rome Fortune’s first headlining show in New York City, and he was joined by an exciting group of up-and-comers: Tunji Ige, Jon Waltz, Chaz French, and Ace Cosgrove.

The night was a huge success, the artists all killed it, and we can’t wait to do it again. Thank you to everyone who came out, and thanks to Liz Barclay and Adam Kargenian for taking pictures.

#NoCeilingsNY

Get to know all the artists who performed here.
